src/lib/components/BeforeAfter.react.js.description: Before After Image Slider based on https://github.com/sneas/img-comparison-slider

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

height.description: image height - default "auto" for responsive images.

width.description: image width - default "100%" for responsive images.

hover.description: Hover:  Automatic slide on mouse over. "hover" or None

value.description: Value The divider position can be specified as a percentage. "0" to "100"

before_style.description: Defines CSS styles of the before image.

after_style.description: Defines CSS styles of the after image.

beforeClassName.description: className of before image. Often used with CSS to style elements with common properties.

afterClassName.description: className of after image. Often used with CSS to style elements with common properties.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
